body_html:
Yes, I shared the same problem with @paulraines68 and have tried both

  1. edit the third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL_nvcc.tpl (@RustingSword )
  2. add --cxxopt="-I/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include/*.h" (@sea-man )

PS I am using bazel (0.5.4), gcc (4.8.5) and compiling tf r1.4.
Any helps are welcome!

body:
Yes, I shared the same problem with @paulraines68 and have tried both
1. edit the third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL_nvcc.tpl (@RustingSword )
2. add --cxxopt="-I/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include/*.h" (@sea-man )

PS I am using bazel (0.5.4), gcc (4.8.5) and compiling tf r1.4.
Any helps are welcome!
